title: Cheating Husband
itunes:title: Cheating Husband
description:
I've been with my boyfriend for six years living together he bought a house and we started going to church. He and I got married and were married in that church to a Luther song, so amazing. Three months into the marriage my husband started to cheat on me with a 24 year old woman who is the same age as his daughter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
